snippet.title: Half Life 1 Mod - Science & Industry - 0.97b Trailer
snippet.description:
This is the only S&I trailer out there and it hasn't been uploaded on Youtube so here you go!

This is the trailer for Science & Industry 0.97b a classic Half Life 1 Teamplay modification created by Mr Bozo.

What is Science and Industry:
Science and Industry is a multiplayer, teamplay mod for the video game Half-Life. It is one of the oldest Half-Life mods and has been described as a classic one. The current version of the game is 1.1, released on December 14, 2006. The game was first publicly released on July 31, 1999, as version 0.94.

Taken from the S&I Wikipedia - http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Science_and_Industry

Keep it in mind that this is not the most recent release of the mod, the most recent release is Science & Industry 1.1

Science & Industry Download:
http://www.gamefront.com/files/15541787/si11.exe

Connect and play with the Science & Industry Community:
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/SImod

Join Goldsrc.net a community dedicated to keeping goldsrc based games alive:
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/goldsrc_net

Science and Industry on Moddb:
http://www.moddb.com/mods/science-and-industry

You will need to own a copy of Half Life 1 on Steam to be able to play S&I
Buy Half Life 1 from the Steam store:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/70/

0.97b Trailer Download:
http://www.fileplanet.com/134943/download/Science-&-Industry-.97b-Trailer
